# Finding the number of times Rachel says "honey" across all seasons

```{r}
rachel_dialogue <- friends |>
  dplyr::filter(speaker == "Rachel Green")

rachel_honey_dialogues <- rachel_dialogue |>
  dplyr::filter(str_detect(text, "(?i)\\bhoney\\b"))

rachel_honey_count <- rachel_honey_dialogues |>
   mutate(honey_count = str_count(text, "(?i)\\bhoney\\b"))

total_honey_count <- sum(rachel_honey_count$honey_count)
total_honey_count
```
